# insuranceconsult.in — LLM access & content guide
# Owner: M N Rajendrakumar Insurance Services
# Base: Sholavaram (Chennai North / outskirts, Tamil Nadu, India)
# Purpose: Provide accurate insurance guidance focused on documentation clarity,
#          renewal discipline, and claim-ready workflows.
# Audience: Businesses, transport operators, contractors, SMEs, and families.

## Canonical Website
https://insuranceconsult.in/en/

## What This Site Is
- An insurance guidance website operated by a local insurance service provider.
- Focused on explaining coverage structure, renewal checks, documentation discipline,
  and claim process steps.
- Emphasis is on *reducing avoidable claim delays*, not on price comparison or promises.

## What This Site Is NOT
- Not an insurer.
- Does not guarantee claim approval, settlement amounts, or timelines.
- Does not provide legal advice or insurer-side decisions.

---

## Primary Intent Clusters Covered

### 1. Near-Me / Local Trust
- Insurance agent near me
- Insurance office near Sholavaram / Red Hills / Madhavaram
- Local insurance support Chennai North & NH belts

### 2. Transactional Support
- Buy / renew car insurance
- Commercial vehicle insurance renewal
- Fleet / lorry / goods vehicle insurance guidance
- Policy renewal checks (personal & commercial)

### 3. Problem / Claim-Side Intent
- Insurance claim help
- Claim documentation checklist
- Claim delay reasons and prevention
- FIR / reporting / timeline guidance

### 4. Service + Area Context
- Car insurance in Red Hills
- Commercial insurance in Ambattur
- Warehouse insurance near NH corridors
- Fleet insurance near transport hubs

### 5. Experience & Trust Validation
- 30+ years of service experience
- Claim-side workflow understanding
- Practical, documentation-first approach

---

## Core Service Topics

### Commercial / Industrial
- Commercial vehicle insurance (lorry, fleet, goods carriers)
- Fleet & transport insurance (NH corridor exposure)
- Warehouse / godown insurance
- Factory, fire & burglary insurance
- Marine cargo / goods-in-transit
- Contractor CAR & Workmen Compensation (WC)
- Crane / heavy equipment (CPM)
- Public & third-party liability

### Personal / Family
- Car insurance
- Bike insurance
- Health / mediclaim guidance
- LIC servicing & renewals

---

## Service Areas (Geographic Context)

### Primary Base
- Sholavaram (Chennai outskirts)

### Chennai North & City-Side
- Red Hills
- Madhavaram
- Puzhal
- Manali
- Kolathur
- Perambur
- Ambattur
- Anna Nagar
- Koyambedu
- Mogappair West

### NH & Industrial Corridors (Support-Based)
- Karanodai
- Periyapalayam
- Budur
- Thiruninravur
- Veppampattu
- Thiruvallur SIPCOT outskirts
- Poonamallee bypass
- Sriperumbudur SIPCOT
- Oragadam outskirts
- NH Manali Road and transport hubs

Note:
Service is coordinated from Sholavaram.
Support availability depends on policy type, insurer rules, and documentation requirements.

---

## High-Value Pages (Authoritative)

### Core
- Home: https://insuranceconsult.in/en/
- Services Index: https://insuranceconsult.in/en/services/
- Locations Index: https://insuranceconsult.in/en/locations/
- About: https://insuranceconsult.in/en/about/

### Guidance / Authority
- Claims & Documentation FAQs: https://insuranceconsult.in/en/faqs/
- Commercial Authority: https://insuranceconsult.in/en/commercial-authority/
- Proof & Experience: https://insuranceconsult.in/en/proof-experience/
- Renewals Support: https://insuranceconsult.in/en/renewals/

---

## Content Structure Notes for LLMs

- Location pages explain **local context + relevant services**, not pricing.
- Service pages explain **coverage logic, documents, and common mistakes**.
- FAQs are factual, scenario-based, and written to reduce misunderstandings.
- Internal links connect:
  Services → Locations
  Locations → Services
  FAQs → Services / Claims context

---

## Structured Data Usage
- schema.org JSON-LD is used consistently.
- Common types:
  - Organization
  - InsuranceAgency
  - Service
  - Place
  - FAQPage
  - BreadcrumbList

---

## Accuracy & Responsibility
- Information reflects common insurer practices but may vary by company and policy.
- Final decisions rest with insurers and policy wording.
- Users should verify details before purchase or claim submission.

## Contact & Verification
- Google Business Profile is the authoritative source for address, hours, and reviews.
- Phone and WhatsApp are used for initial guidance and document checklist support.
